pages.content: Ladybug| crawls,| step| by| step| home.| Too| tired,| Ladybug| can't| walk| anymore.

Little| Mouse| passes| by| and| says: 
- Hi,| Ladybug.| Let's| climb| on| my| back!| My| back| is| soft,| I| will| carry| you| home!
Little| Mouse| carries| Ladybug| on| his| back.| He| runs| step| by| step.| Oh,| so| tired!| Little| Mouse| can't| go| anymore.

Green| Turtle| passes| by| and| says:
- Hi,| Ladybug| and| Little| Mouse.| Let's| climb| on| my| back!| My| back| is| strong,| I'll| carry| you| home!
Green| Turtle| carries| Little| Mouse| and| Ladybug| on| his| back.| He| moves| step| by| step.| "I| am| so| tired!" | Green| Turtle| can't| walk| anymore.

Gray| Elephant| passes| by| and| says:
- Hi,| Ladybug,| Little| Mouse,| and| Green| Turtle.| Let's| climb| on| my| back!| My| back| is| big| and| strong,| I| will| carry| you| all| home!
Gray| Elephant| carries| Green| Turtle,| Little| Mouse,| and| Ladybug| on| his| back.| He| goes| step| by| step| strongly.| Gray| Elephant| is| not| tired| at| all!

Ah,| here| is| the| Ladybug's| house.| Ladybug| climbs| down| Little| Mouse’s| back| and| says:
- Thank| you,| guys.| You| are| all| so| kind.

Ah,| here| is| Little| Mouse's| cave.| Little| Mouse| climbs| down| Green| Turtle’s| back| and| says:
- Thank| you,| guys.| You| all| go| home| carefully.

Ah,| here| is| Green| Turtle's| house.| Green| Turtle| climbs| down| Gray| Elephant’s| back| and| says:
- Thank| you,| Gray| Elephant.| Have| a| good| evening!
They| are| all| home| already.| Gray| Elephant,| you| should| go| home| too!
